content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 70.4 - Classes of operating certificates

State Regulations
(a) Schools for the mentally retarded shall
be a class of operating certificate. All facilities for the residential care, treatment, training or education of the mentally retarded which are required by
law to be operated only in accordance with an operating certificate issued by
the commissioner shall be eligible for an operating certificate only in the
schools for the mentally retarded class. (b) Hospitals for the mentally ill shall be a
class of operating certificate. All facilities for the inpatient care or
treatment of the mentally ill, including but not limited to facilities
maintained by a political subdivision of the State and any part of a general
hospital operated for the purpose of providing inpatient services to the
mentally ill, which are required by law to be operated only in accordance with
an operating certificate issued by the commissioner shall be eligible for an
operating certificate only in the hospitals for the mentally ill
class. (c) Alcoholism facilities
shall be a class of operating certificate. All facilities for the inpatient
care and treatment of alcoholics, including but not limited to any part of a
general hospital operated for the purpose of providing inpatient services to
alcoholics, which are required by law to be operated only in accordance with an
operating certificate issued by the commissioner shall be eligible for an
operating certificate only in the alcoholism facilities class. (d) Outpatient facilities for the mentally
disabled shall be a class of operating certificate. (1)

All facilities for the outpatient or
nonresidential examination, diagnosis, care, treatment, rehabilitation, or
training of the mentally ill, the mentally retarded, or alcoholics, or any
combination thereof, which are required by law to be operated only in
accordance with an operating certificate issued by the commissioner shall be
eligible for an operating certificate in the outpatient facilities for the
mentally disabled class. (2)

Any
facility eligible for an operating certificate in the outpatient facilities for
the mentally disabled class which is operated in conjunction with an inpatient
or residential facility eligible for an operating certificate may be included
in the latter operating certificate issued to a single provider of
services. (e) Community
residence for the mentally disabled shall be a class of operating certificate. All facilities for the residential care, training, and supervised living of the
mentally disabled which are required by law to be operated only in accordance
with an operating certificate issued by the commissioner shall be eligible for
an operating certificate in the community residence class. (f) Intermediate care facility for the
developmentally disabled shall be a class of operating certificate. All
facilities for the residential care, supervision, habilitation and treatment of
the developmentally disabled, which meet the requirements for medical
assistance participation as intermediate care facility for the developmentally
disabled, and which are required by law to be operated only in accordance with
an operating certificate issued by the commissioner, shall be eligible for an
operating certificate only in the intermediate care facility for the
developmentally disabled class. (g) Specialty hospital shall be a class of operating certificate. All facilities
for the time-limited residential care and the provision of services by or under
the direction of a physician for the treatment of health-related problems
associated or present with developmental disabilities, which are required by
law to be operated only in accordance with an operating certificate issued by
the commissioner, shall be eligible for an operating certificate only in the
specialty hospital class. (h) Diagnostic and research clinic shall be a class of operating certificate. All
facilities for the comprehensive behavioral and medically related assessment
and diagnostic services to developmentally disabled persons, or persons
suspected of being developmentally disabled, which meet the requirements for
medical assistance participation and which are required by law to be operated
only in accordance with an operating certificate issued by the commissioner, shall be eligible for an operating certificate only in the diagnostic and
research clinic class. Notes
